The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. Psychotria lhotzkyana is also noted for its role in ecological interactions, particularly with certain species of insects and birds.
